name: text
docstring: A foundational text primitive based on the <span> element.

properties.name: as_child
properties.docstring: Change the default rendered element for the one passed as a child, merging their props and behavior.

properties.name: as_
properties.docstring: Change the default rendered element into a semantically appropriate alternative (cannot be used with asChild)

properties.name: high_contrast
properties.docstring: Whether to render the text with higher contrast color

styling_props.name: color_scheme
styling_props.docstring: Overrides the accent color inherited from the Theme.
